dialogflow_fallback_responses_limit_desc: The app will automatically trigger handover if consecutive fallback intents are triggered N no of times. This setting defines this value N
target_department_for_handover_descripti: Upon bot-to-liveagent handover, the visitor will be transferred to this Department
dialogflow_handover_message_description: The Bot will send this message to Visitor upon handover
dialogflow_service_unavailable_message_d: The Bot will send this message to Visitor if service is unavailable
dialogflow_close_chat_message_descriptio: This message will be sent automatically when a chat is closed
dialogflow_hide_quick_replies_descriptio: If enabled, then all quick-replies will hide when a visitor clicks on any one of them
dialogflow_enable_chat_closed_by_visitor: Enable Dialogflow Event When Visitor Ends Chat
If enabled, then a dialogflow event will be triggered when visitor ends chat
dialogflow_chat_closed_by_visitor_event_: Dialogflow Event Name When Visitor Ends Chat
The bot will trigger this dialogflow event when visitor ends chat
dialogflow_welcome_intent_on_start_descr: If enabled, then a welcome message will be sent when bot is assigned to any visitor
